name: Amplify
description: "Amplify Mission is to provide SMEs with a sustainable alternative financing method by involving digital assets investors. Amplify believes that through Decentralized Finance (DeFi) we can forge a win-win B2B2C relationship between SMEs and community investors, achieving the needs of all parties and building a sustainable and efficient economy. Unique value proposition ● SMEs get easy access to funding ● Funding real world assets ● Defi community owners get to earn from lending from real assets returns and not basis speculation ● Target to be multi-chain purpose ● Without the financial intermediary, main benefits go to both the borrower and lender. ● SME’s also get benefits from earning the governance token and participate in the crypto ecosystem"
